entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY LATE THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS LATE THIS EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH LATE THIS EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
